string.name: for_instructions_click_on_this_link
string.u: For Instructions click on this link

resources.string: The goal of the game is to tap the correct color as quickly as possible. The game will display a color name (e.g., \"RED\"), but the color of the text may not match the name (e.g., \"RED\" might be written in blue). The player has to quickly tap the correct colored button.
